mapper.sql: cid, tecid, kid, cname, score, add_day, crouse_time, price, integral, onchoose, crouse_introduce, img
c.cid, c.tecid, c.kid, c.cname, c.score, c.add_day, c.crouse_time, c.price, c.integral, c.onchoose, c.crouse_introduce, img

mapper.update:
update crouse_info
tecid = #{tecid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kid = #{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL},
add_day = #{addDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
crouse_time = #{crouseTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
onchoose = #{onchoose,jdbcType=CHAR},
crouse_introduce = #{crouseIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update crouse_info set tecid = #{tecid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kid = #{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, add_day = #{addDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, crouse_time = #{crouseTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, onchoose = #{onchoose,jdbcType=CHAR}, crouse_introduce = #{crouseIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from crouse_info where cname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cname},'%')) ORDER BY cid

select
from crouse_info c inner join tb_teacher t on c.tecid = t.tecid where tecname = #{tecname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
